name: Recreation of Halo: Duck Hunt Extreme
name_original: Recreation of Halo: Duck Hunt Extreme
description:
This is a FPS prototype project based on the Halo: Duck Hunt Extreme mod as seen here:


Controls:

WASD - Movement
Left Click - Fire weapon
ESC - Exit game

Rules:
If more than 50% of the robots reach the end of the level you will lose!
There are 5 spawn waves with random amounts of robots and wave durations.

Survive all 5 waves and you win!
